name: EmailContactStatement
description:
Sends an email statement to a specified contact.

This tool triggers an email statement to be sent to a specific contact using Zoho Books. If no JSON input is provided, the email will use default content. Use this tool when you need to send financial statements to clients or contacts.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization. Required to send the email statement to a specified contact.

parameters.name: contact_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the contact to send the statement to.

parameters.name: statement_start_date
parameters.description: The starting date for the statement in the format [yyyy-mm-dd]. If omitted, the current month will be used.

value_schema.description: If start_date and end_date are not given, current month's statement will be sent to contact. Date format [yyyy-mm-dd]

parameters.name: statement_end_date
parameters.description: End date for the statement in the format [yyyy-mm-dd]. If not provided, the current month's statement will be sent.

value_schema.description: End date for the statement. Date format [yyyy-mm-dd]

parameters.name: attachment_files
parameters.description: Files to be attached with the statement email, in multipart/form-data format.

value_schema.description: Files to be attached along with the statement.

parameters.name: email_request_body
parameters.description: JSON object containing email details such as sender, recipients, subject, and body.

send_from_org_email_id.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

cc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be cced.

subject.description: Subject of an email has to be sent. Max-length [1000]

body.description: Body of an email has to be sent. Max-length [5000]
